snippet.title: ✶ curiosmos ✶ Teaser
snippet.description:
This is the extended teaser made for the Wholesome Direct! I hope you like it. 

The game in short: Curiosmos is a charming space adventure where you create your own solar system. Make cute planets from stardust, add gravity, atmosphere, moons, and even life.

If that all sounds great then you can wishlist Curiosmos ☞ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585710

And for more info you can visit our ☞ https://curiosmos.space/
Or follow more of the development on ☞ https://twitter.com/CelineVeltman
There are also silly videos for your enjoyment on ☞ https://www.tiktok.com/@celineveltman

Lots of love,
Céline & the Silly Stars
